Record.Synonym: Acute Ulcerative Enteritis of the Mouse Intestinal Tract
Record.Description: Representing a spectrum of small and large bowel inflammatory diseases of unknown etiology. It includes Crohn's disease, ulcerative colitis, and colitis of indeterminate type. --2003
